paragraph:
Sample Document for PDF Text Extraction
This document is created to test PDF text extraction functionality in the AI backend project.
Sections:
1. Introduction
- Purpose of this document is to provide sample text.
- It covers multiple paragraphs and simple formatting.
2. Features
- Upload PDF files.
- Extract text using pdfplumber and OCR.
- Store text and metadata.
3. Conclusion
- Successful extraction enables further processing like embeddings.
- Ready for next development phase.
Date: May 19, 2025
Author: AI Project Team
End of Document.
